get.description: If search query string 'field={field}&value={value}' is provided, then a list of the patients that satisfy the search criteria is returned. If no query string is provided, all patients are returned. If only 'value={value}' is provided, then patients with ID that contains {value} are returned.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Search field. To search by patient id, use USUBJID or OPTIMISEID.
